Check out thes as an example:

Note:
* You'll be reading in an excel file, not a .csv
* Then make sure usethis::use_data() works
* Then do data cleaning


```{r}
usethis::use_data(MacLeish_Data_Plot_MC_01, overwrite = TRUE)
usethis::use_data(MacLeish_Data_Plot_MC_02, overwrite = TRUE)
```
